description: You've always had a knack for finding the value in life, wether it's $200 or $50 for a life.  You get more money from completing hordes.
You've become very skilled with cutting weapons of all sorts, and know how to use them better.
You've become very skilled with blunt instruments of all sorts, and know how to use them better.
You're very in tune with the ways of stabbing somebody.
You've become a master of melee, and are skilled with melee weapons.
Your time exercising has gotten you used to being winded, and has vastly expanded your stamina.  You can go for longer and harder now.
You're like a cat, and it always seemed to you like you've had nine lives.  When things get rough, by pure luck or divine intervention, you can get out of it.
Someone must be watching over you!  Whenever you're in combat, you can call for the help of a stranger for a short amount of time.
